sentences.sentence: We have to pressurise and score at the start in order to control the game.
sentences.translation: 我们必须保持压力，在开场就进球以便控制比赛。

sentences.sentence: Electricity would be used to heat and pressurise argon gas that is then fed into one of the silos.
sentences.translation: 电能用来加热和增压送进其中一个筒仓的氩气。

sentences.sentence: The Russians use the threat of redirecting oil and gas supplies eastward to pressurise their European customers.
sentences.translation: 俄罗斯人利用威胁将石油和天然气改向东方供应向他们的东欧客户施压。
